flow.descriptionCdata:
a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.0d0be55f-665f-4902-9b81-d71d86ea3d23.prompt=Component ID a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.421f530c-f3bf-40d8-9602-8a7635acbd34.description=This workflow adds/updates the component property using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing property (In this case input "valueType" is not required , This input will not be considered even if provided) no - To add/update property valueType - Value type of the property. It can have value from selection list "CSA-Property-ValueType". This Input is required only when Input "onlyUpdate" is selected as "no". values - One or more values dilimited by comma , (If user want to use some other separator for multiple values then needs to be pass as next input "separator") separator - A delimiter that separates elements in the values ( default dilimiter used is comma ,) a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.5994f07d-444f-46ec-a380-30a017046018.prompt=User Identifier a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.6529b7a2-1339-42fd-973e-635681e95c4f.description=This workflow returns the artifact's properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.88d32348-baae-47c4-b0d2-3b83342d27e0.prompt=Artifact ID a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.8c3d2542-1261-4e87-9a02-8cdb9a9a4e69.description=
Divides two numbers

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1/value2

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.9ceea058-f356-4b08-a757-91f1fbb9f633.prompt=User Identifier a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.b097f177-0208-45ce-8dc7-13159efc8b8e.description=
Subtracts two numbers

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The difference of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.c1306506-67e9-4d11-a0c1-ea4e43749384.description=
Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null.

Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: 
The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - If the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - If some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.c43c3cf4-9820-41aa-a0d3-51287b929695.prompt=Service Component Id a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.c92821ec-9e55-44fb-a797-79b774344f46.prompt=Service Component Id a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.description=
Remove a Server from the Server Group

Input Parameters\:
serverGrpId - Server Group Component Id
serviceInstanceId - Service Instance Id of the Subscription
serverId - Server component Id 
reduceServers - Number of Servers to be removed - default to 1
userIdentifier - OO Application UUID to authorize a REST Call

Responses\:
   success -  if the command completes execution and its exit code is 0
   failure - otherwise

Result Fields\:
 NA
a7f2eabe-13bc-41cf-97b0-33f56e5e0546.fcacdf07-1a6a-49a6-b1a5-586df4791638.prompt=Service Instance Id
flow.name: vCenter Flex-in Server

staticBinding.value: Failed to remove server from the server group
